entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:21 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
